scripts.build: if [ "$NODE_ENV" = "production" ]; then prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prod.prisma && (prisma migrate deploy --schema=prisma/schema.prod.prisma || prisma db push --schema=prisma/schema.prod.prisma); else prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prisma; fi && next build --turbopack
scripts.postinstall: if [ "$NODE_ENV" = "production" ]; then prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prod.prisma; else prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prisma; fi
